goals.active: Wolf Shaman Gamli needs my assistance.
goals.complete: Wolf Shaman Gamli needs my help with the stricken Wolf Havroun's apprentice, Valda. She's stuck in a deep, restless sleep. Gamli asked me to get winter sage, a medicinal plant that he can use to wake Valda. Then we can find out what happened to her and her master.

goals.active: Harvest winter sage from the grawl caves.
goals.complete: I harvested winter sage and taught the grawl not to get in the way when I'm on a mercy mission. Wolf Shaman Gamli is waiting in Hoelbrak so he can use it to help the stricken Wolf Havroun's apprentice, Valda.

goals.active: Bring the winter sage to Valda in Hoelbrak.
goals.complete: The winter sage revived Valda, but she could only rant incoherently about invaders in the Mists. To find out what this means, Eir and I will go to Snow Leopard Havroun Svena.
